FrageText.de: Wie erkennen Sie, dass Sie in ein Ortsgebiet einfahren?
FrageText.en: How do you know you are entering a town?
FrageText.hr: Kako prepoznajete da ste ušli u naselje?
FrageText.sl: Kako spoznate, da ste zapeljali v naselje?

de.Text: An Häusern rechts und links der Straße
An der durchgehenden Beleuchtung der Straße

en.Text: By the signpost indicating the name of town
By the houses lining the street
By the continuous lighting of the street
By the sidewalks beside the roadway

hr.Text: Po kućama s desne i lijeve strane ceste
Po rasvjeti koja ide niz cijelu cestu

sl.Text: Po hišah na levi in desni strani ceste
